original_title: Twink Peaks: A Gay XXX Parody
overview: Dark and sensual secrets are afoot in the secluded mountain town of Twink Peaks where Doomed lovers Vadim and Noah Reside. Only the woods know the dark and perverted nature of this place, but one thing is for sure: It will bring together its horniest residents.
title: Twink Peaks: A Gay XXX Parody
